text: Have you thought about how important it is to save children?
Yes. I work in the field of fundraising and am exposed to organizations that help children.
Have you heard about the specific organization "Save the Children"?
Yes, I have. My company did work for them years ago.
So you know that they are a no-government organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries?
Yes, I do.
Would you be interested in donating to them?
I may be interested.
If you did, your donation could make a huge impact in children's lives.
I understand that.
The research team who put this together is collecting donations to send to Save the Children.
Okay. How much have they collected?
I'm not sure what the total is currently.
Oh, okay. How do I know that this is legit?
Well, you don\'t have to "mail" or give out banking info. Instead, you can agree to give a portion of your payment. It\'s directly deducted from your task payment.
Ah, I see.
You have the option of donating between $0 to all of your payment ($2).
I will donate a portion of it.
That's awesome! How much would you like to donate?
I would like to donate $0.25.
Great, thank you so much!
